dct_title_s: [Map of Palestine and the tribes of Israel]
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Stadia" and "Miliaria italica".
Illustrations of settlements, people, ships, compass roses, animals, and biblical events throughout.
Shows topography, vegetation, drainage, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Descriptive text throughout and in a decorative cartouche: Abraham habitans in ur oppido...
Sites are numbered throughout; there is no key present.
2 inset maps: Itinera et mansiones deserti -- Peregrinatio Abrahae.
